description: '''Park Young-tak''' (born 13 May 1983), credited mononymously as '''Young Tak''' ({{langx|ko|영탁}}, commonly stylized as '''YOUNGTAK'''), is a South Korean singer, songwriter, actor and television personality. He made his debut in 2007 as a [[Trot (music)|ballad]] singer with his 1st album ''Young Tak Disia''. In 2016, he started his trot career with the release of his first trot single album, ''Nuna You Are Perfect''. In 2020, he became well known by placing second in the [[TV Chosun]] audition show ''[[Mr Trot|Mr. Trot]]'' out of 17,000 participants with his biggest hit "Jjiniya".
